author: James Martin
method: Heat the oil in a small pan.  Add the shallots, tomatoes and garlic and cook out for 5-8 minutes or until softened.  Add the vinegar and sugar and cook out for a further 3-5 minutes or until the chutney has caramelised slightly. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ shallot, chopped,  1 ½ tomatoes, chopped,  1 clove garlic, crushed,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  1 tsp brown sugar
